Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires that all motor vehicles sold at motor vehicle dealerships contain a spare tire
Summary: Requires that all motor vehicles sold at motor vehicle dealerships contain a spare tire which is at least a donut tire.
LawCode: Add ยง396-pp, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring that all motor vehicles sold at motor vehicle dealerships contain a spare tire
